item.title: Structural topic modeling: a trial
item.description: link here: structural topic modeling | R Club (uoregon.edu) stmVignette.pdf learning stm using DT and Higher Education #dtc160 <- convert2df( # file = "DTHghEdCov160.bib", # dbsource = "scopus", # format = "bibtex" # ) #dtnc1667 <- convert2df( # file = "DTHghEdNCov1667.bib", # dbsource = "scopus", # format = "bibtex" # ) select variables select Document Title (TI), Keywords associated by SCOPUS or ISI database (ID), Authors’ Keywords (DE) and Abstract (AB), then combined to one variable.
